dict.string: -- Register with Growl tell application "GrowlHelperApp" -- The notification types set the allNotificationsList to {"Copy to Clipboard Result"} set the enabledNotificationList to allNotificationsList -- Register script with growl register as application ¬ "Chrome Helper" all notifications allNotificationsList ¬ default notifications enabledNotificationList ¬ icon of application "Google Chrome" end tell set urlList to "" tell application "Google Chrome" set tabList to every tab of front window set linkCount to 0 repeat with aTab in tabList set linkCount to linkCount + 1 -- log linkCount set aLink to URL of aTab set urlList to urlList & aLink & return end repeat tell document 1 set the clipboard to urlList end tell end tell tell application "GrowlHelperApp" notify with name ¬ "Copy to Clipboard Result" title ¬ "Copied Chrome Tabs to Clipboard" description "Successfully copied " & linkCount & ¬ " links to the clipboard." application name "Chrome Helper" end tell -- log urlList

dict.string: tell application "System Events" to tell process "nvALT" set p to value of text field 1 of group 1 of tool bar 1 of window 1 set homeDir to (path to home folder from user domain as Unicode text) -- set f to POSIX file (homeDir & "Dropbox/Elements/" & p & ".txt") as alias set f to (homeDir & "Dropbox:Elements:" & p & ".txt") as alias end tell tell application "Marked" open f activate end tell

on appIsRunning(appName) tell application "System Events" to (name of processes) contains appName end appIsRunning on runApp(appName) if not appIsRunning(appName) then log "Running " & appName try launch application appName on error log "Error Launching " & appName end try end if end runApp on basename(the_file) set the_path to quoted form of (POSIX path of the_file) as string set cmd to ("php -r \"echo pathinfo(" & the_path & ", PATHINFO_FILENAME);\"") set output to do shell script cmd return output end basename on file_exists(unix_path) tell application "Finder" exists my POSIX file (unix_path) end tell end file_exists set appList to {"Dropbox", "Flux", "Caffeine", "Skitch", ¬ "TextExpander", "iTeleport Connect", "Tags", ¬ "/Applications/Keyboard Maestro.app/Contents/Resources/Keyboard Maestro Engine.app", ¬ "/Library/PreferencePanes/Growl.prefPane/Contents/Resources/GrowlHelperApp.app", ¬ "/Applications/HoudahSpot.app/Contents/Resources/HoudahSpotHelper.app", ¬ "/Applications/iTunes.app/Contents/Resources/iTunesHelper.app"} repeat with appPath in appList if file_exists(appPath) then set appName to basename(appPath) runApp(appName) else set appName to appPath set appPath to "/Applications/" & appName & ".app" if file_exists(appPath) then runApp(appName) else log "Could not find App: " & appName end if end if end repeat

set userLibraryPath to POSIX path of (path to library folder from user domain as Unicode text) set libraryPath to POSIX path of (path to library folder as Unicode text) set appList to {¬ "Caffeine", ¬ "Dropbox", ¬ "LaunchBar", ¬ "Flux", ¬ "QuickCursor", ¬ "iTeleport Connect", ¬ "Skitch", ¬ "TextExpander", ¬ "smcFanControl", ¬ "/Applications/Keyboard Maestro.app/Contents/Resources/Keyboard Maestro Engine.app", ¬ "/Applications/HoudahSpot.app/Contents/Resources/HoudahSpotHelper.app", ¬ "/Applications/iTunes.app/Contents/Resources/iTunesHelper.app", ¬ libraryPath & "PreferencePanes/Growl.prefPane/Contents/Resources/GrowlHelperApp.app", ¬ userLibraryPath & "PreferencePanes/Growl.prefPane/Contents/Resources/GrowlHelperApp.app", ¬ libraryPath & "PreferencePanes/Hazel.prefPane/Contents/Resources/HazelHelper.app", ¬ userLibraryPath & "PreferencePanes/Hazel.prefPane/Contents/Resources/HazelHelper.app", ¬ libraryPath & "PreferencePanes/PastebotSync.prefPane/Contents/Resources/PastebotSync.app", ¬ userLibraryPath & ¬ "PreferencePanes/PastebotSync.prefPane/Contents/Resources/PastebotSync.app"} -- "Quicksilver", ¬ -- "Keymando", ¬ -- "Tags", ¬ -- "TextMate", ¬ -- "Mail", ¬ -- "nvALT", ¬ -- "iTerm", ¬ -- "Adium", ¬ -- "Marked", ¬ on appIsRunning(appName) tell application "System Events" to (name of processes) contains appName end appIsRunning on runApp(appName) if not appIsRunning(appName) then log "Running " & appName try launch application appName on error log "Error Launching " & appName end try end if end runApp on basename(the_file) set the_path to quoted form of (POSIX path of the_file) as string set cmd to ("php -r \"echo pathinfo(" & the_path & ", PATHINFO_FILENAME);\"") set output to do shell script cmd return output end basename on file_exists(unix_path) tell application "Finder" exists my POSIX file (unix_path) end tell end file_exists repeat with appPath in appList if file_exists(appPath) then set appName to basename(appPath) runApp(appName) else set appName to appPath set appPath to "/Applications/" & appName & ".app" if file_exists(appPath) then runApp(appName) else log "Could not find App: " & appName end if end if end repeat

dict.string: set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set growl to loadlib("growl") tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell core to set finder to loadlib("finder") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() tell finder to setLabel(2, currentlyPlaying) -- tell application "Finder" -- reveal currentlyPlaying -- end tell tell growl to growl("VLC", "Labeled Video Red") tell vlc to next()
RED - Label Currently Playing video red in finder

set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set growl to loadlib("growl") tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell core to set finder to loadlib("finder") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() tell finder to setLabel(6, currentlyPlaying) tell growl to growl("VLC", "Labeled Video Green")
GREEN - Label Currently Playing Video Green in Finder

on VLC_GetCurrentlyPlaying() set _currentlyPlaying to do shell script "lsof -p $(/usr/local/bin/pidof VLC) | cut -c 77-1000 | grep -i -E '(mkv|avi|m4v|mp4|wmv|flv|mov|mpg|vob)$'" end VLC_GetCurrentlyPlaying on VLC_RevealCurrentlyPlaying() set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() tell application "Finder" set posix_path to POSIX file currentlyPlaying as alias reveal posix_path end tell end VLC_RevealCurrentlyPlaying VLC_RevealCurrentlyPlaying()
REVEAL - Reveal Currently Playing Video in Finder

dict.string: property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 0 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying
Rate 0 - Rate Currently Playing Video in VLC

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 1 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 2 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 3 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 4 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() set output to do shell script openmeta & " -r 5 -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying

property openmeta : "openmeta" set scriptsDir to (path to scripts folder from user domain as Unicode text) set core to load script (scriptsDir & "lib:core.scpt") as alias tell core to set vlc to loadlib("vlc") tell core to set growl to loadlib("growl") tell vlc to set currentlyPlaying to getCurrentlyPlaying() on getOpenMetaInfo(theFile) local theInfo set output to do shell script openmeta & " -p " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set tid to AppleScript's text item delimiters set AppleScript's text item delimiters to character id 13 -- new line set theInfo to the text items of output set AppleScript's text item delimiters to tid return items 2 thru -1 of theInfo end getOpenMetaInfo on getMediaInfo(theFile) local theInfo, duration set theInfo to return set theFormat to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"General;%Format%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theExt to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"General;%FileExtension%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theInfo to theInfo & "Format: " & theFormat & " (" & theExt & ")" & return set filesize to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"General;%FileSize/String%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theInfo to theInfo & "FileSize: " & filesize & return set duration to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"General;%Duration/String3%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theInfo to theInfo & "Duration: " & duration & return set theWidth to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"Video;%Width%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theHeight to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"Video;%Height%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theInfo to theInfo & "Dimensions: " & theWidth & "x" & theHeight & return set theTitle to do shell script "/usr/local/bin/mediainfo --Inform=\"General;%Title%\" " & quoted form of POSIX path of theFile set theInfo to theInfo & "Title: " & theTitle & return return theInfo end getMediaInfo set basename to do shell script "basename " & quoted form of POSIX path of currentlyPlaying set inf to getOpenMetaInfo(currentlyPlaying) set medinf to getMediaInfo(currentlyPlaying) tell core to set infoString to list_to_text(inf, return) set info to infoString & medinf tell growl to growl("VLC " & basename, info)
INFO - Growl Currently Playing Video's Info

dict.data: AAAAAAFAAAIAAQxNYWNpbnRvc2gg SEQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAADFk0UI SCsAAAJQKN8HVkxDLmFwcAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAg/J5cnJ6L4AAAAA AAAAAP////8AAAkgAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAADEFwcGxpY2F0aW9ucwAQ AAgAAMWTi1gAAAARAAgAAMnKIP4A AAABAAQCUCjfAAIAIk1hY2ludG9z aCBIRDpBcHBsaWNhdGlvbnM6AFZM Qy5hcHAADgAQAAcAVgBMAEMALgBh AHAAcAAPABoADABNAGEAYwBpAG4A dABvAHMAaAAgAEgARAASABRBcHBs aWNhdGlvbnMvVkxDLmFwcAATAAEv AP//AAA=

dict.string:
tell application "System Events" set fma to first process whose frontmost is true end tell
tell application (name of fma) set fmwBounds to bounds of first window end tell
tell application "Finder" set desktopBounds to bounds of window of desktop end tell
set fmwWidth to (item 3 of fmwBounds) – (item 1 of fmwBounds) set fmwHeight to (item 4 of fmwBounds) – (item 2 of fmwBounds)
set desktopWidth to (item 3 of desktopBounds) – (item 1 of desktopBounds) set desktopHeight to (item 4 of desktopBounds) – (item 2 of desktopBounds)
set newX to (desktopWidth / 2) – (fmwWidth / 2) set newY to (desktopHeight / 2) – (fmwHeight / 2)
set newBounds to {newX, newY, newX + fmwWidth, newY + fmwHeight} tell application (name of fma) set bounds of first window to newBounds end tell

dict.data: AAAAAAFOAAIAAQxNYWNpbnRvc2gg SEQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAADFk0UI SCsAAAJQKN8KaVR1bmVzLmFwcAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAlKKd8oUM7UAAAAA AAAAAP////8AAAkgAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAADEFwcGxpY2F0aW9ucwAQ AAgAAMWTi1gAAAARAAgAAMoUa/UA AAABAAQCUCjfAAIAJU1hY2ludG9z aCBIRDpBcHBsaWNhdGlvbnM6AGlU dW5lcy5hcHAAAA4AFgAKAGkAVAB1 AG4AZQBzAC4AYQBwAHAADwAaAAwA TQBhAGMAaQBuAHQAbwBzAGgAIABI AEQAEgAXQXBwbGljYXRpb25zL2lU dW5lcy5hcHAAABMAAS8A//8AAA==

dict.string: -- Obtain current resolution tell application "Finder" set screenSize to bounds of window of desktop set screenWidth to item 3 of screenSize set screenHeight to item 4 of screenSize -- log "screenWidth: " & screenWidth -- log "screenHeight: " & screenHeight --display dialog "Screen resolution: " & screenWidth & " X " & screenHeight & " " & screenSize as Unicode text end tell tell application "iTerm" -- set winProperties to properties of front window set winBounds to bounds of front window -- log winBounds set winWidth to item 3 of winBounds -- log "winWidth: " & winWidth set winHeight to item 4 of winBounds -- log "winHeight: " & winHeight set the properties of front window to {bounds:{screenWidth - (screenWidth / 3), 22, screenWidth, screenHeight - 72}} end tell
